Q_DESC: Roy has numerous photos  with unique numeric ID for each photo he has. The ID is generated based on the time of capturing the photo. He wants to arrange the photos in the time order of capturing the photos.  The task is to write small numbers from input to output.  All numbers at input are integers of one or two digits defining the ID of the image. Help Roy to develop a C Program to arrange all the photos in the increasing order with respect to the PHOTO_ID  using Selection Sort Method using Functions
